name: Alien Santa
description:
Fly your UFO and deliver Presents to Good Humans and Coal to Naughty Humans.

Use your beam on chimneys to reveal whether the residents deserve a present or a lump of coal.
Delivering the correct item to residents will award you more time to spread christmasy love all over the globe.

Now go... Surprise those Humans and save Christmas!

Single player controls:

  D - Move Right
  A - Move Left
  W - Move Up
  S - Move Down
  Mouse - Aim Beam
  Left Click - Beam Present
  Right Click - Beam Coal

Hatfilms mode controls:

  D - Move Right
  A - Move Left
  Up Arrow - Move Up
  Down Arrow - Move Down
  Mouse - Aim Beam
  Left Click - Beam Present
  Right Click - Beam Coal

made in [Unity]
